Name: Solid State
Effect: Advantage on all skill checks made to use the Harvest downtime activity.

Name: Preprocessing
Effect: You can gain the benefits of the Prepare downtime activity an additional time, but gain a stack of exhaustion if you do. Exhaustion added before standard exhaustion removal occurs.

Name: Control Flow
Effect: Advantage on all skill checks made to use the Enchant downtime activity.

Name: Error Correction
Effect: Donwtime activity: make a difficulty 15 Focus (Insight) skill check. If you succeed, gain a resolve.
